price: (30) That He may give them in full their rewards and increase for them of His bounty. Indeed, He is Forgiving and Appreciative.[1250]
arabic: لِيُوَفِّيَهُمۡ أُجُورَهُمۡ وَيَزِيدَهُم مِّن فَضۡلِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ غَفُورٞ شَكُورٞ
footnotes: [1250]- i.e., He gives much in return for little and multiplies rewards.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: liyuwaffiyahum ujūrahum wayazīdahum min faḍlihi innahu ghafūrun shakūrun
translations: That He may give them in full
